name: Elder Survivor
description:
In a realm, the world light comes from a mythical tree called the Elder Tree. Located in the Garden Valley, the tree has been tainted by dark forces, threatening to plunge the kingdom into eternal night. You play as a hero who has gone to exterminate the profaners in order to purify the tree.

Elder Survivor is a vampire survivor-like (time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements) made by myself for the GBJam#10. You have to survive as long as possible while swarms of enemies are surrouding you. Gain experience and upgrade your character by getting new weapons.

Inputs :

  • keyboard arrows : character movements
  • escape : pause game
  • tab : display unlocked weapons

Sound design made by Francis L'Ectomorphe

None of the assets in the project have been created by me, i used purchased assets and free game resources you can find on itchio or else. Here's the list, thank you all for all the awesome assets !

  • Wind Spell Effect 02 by pimen (itch.io)
  • Dialogue Frames by VectorPixelStar (itch.io)
  • Gameboy Cartridge + Box by leafthief (itch.io)
  • Roret Cursor by Lintnaya (itch.io)
  • Game Boy Splash in Unity by Big Gloves (itch.io)
  • GBCamera for Unity by rogueNoodle (itch.io)
  • Thunder Spell Effect 02 by pimen (itch.io)
  • Textures by VectorPixelStar (itch.io)
  • Monsters Creatures Fantasy by LuizMelo (itch.io)
  • Generic RUN n' GUN pack by Estúdio Vaca Roxa (itch.io)
  • FREE Music Pack 7: Chiptune 3 by Retro Indie Josh (itch.io)
  • Retro Texture Pack by Little Martian (itch.io)
  • Ocean's Nostalgia - RPG Maker MZ Heroes by Oceans Dream (itch.io)
  • Ocean's Nostalgia - RPG Maker VX Heroes by Oceans Dream, Caz (itch.io)
  • Pixel Art Top Down - Basic by Cainos (itch.io)
